A new website
18 Oct 2016

I’ve always had a stop-and-go relationship with personal webpages. In the spirit of change, I decided to revamp my website from the bottom up. It feels cleaner and better suited to posting regular content.

Lukas Himsel designed the theme this site derived from. Thanks Lukas!
